ppy/helm-charts.summary: Recent activities in the ppy/helm-charts repository include multiple updates to the index.yaml file, addition of probes configuration, re-structuring of octane and assets configurations, and enhancements to storage RWX documentation. Furthermore, upgrades to osu-beatmap-difficulty-lookup-cache subchart and osu-web chart 2024.1224.0 have been implemented, along with updates to container ports and probe type comparisons.

ppy/osu-wiki.summary: A recent pull request in the ppy/osu-wiki repository aims to add podium and badge images to the `Sparxe's Two Key Event` page, following the contribution checklist to ensure thorough testing and adherence to guidelines.

ppy/osu.summary: A recent push event in the ppy/osu repository enabled the seasonal feature, indicating preparation for upcoming events or releases.

ppy/osu-framework.summary: A pull request in the ppy/osu-framework repository proposes the addition of support for locking screen orientation on iOS devices, intended for use in osu! to maintain a consistent gameplay experience by preventing orientation changes during play.
